::Chimpanzor::
::Orangutron::
::Gorillax::
::Gibbot::

All four Primed Apes were in one stasis pod.  The
extras on their ship had broken down.  Now they were
all crowded into one little space and they were
getting tired of each other.  "Move over guys,"
Gorillax roared.

Orangutron snapped back at him, "Your the one taking
up the most room."

Then they saw it. Earth. The place they had been
headed all along. When they landed they were relieved.
They finally got to strech their legs.
